string-array.name: help_smartcard0
string-array.item: 1. How to use Smart Card - Entry/Exit:At entry, hold your card close to the machine for gates to open. Do the same at destination station for exit"\n"
2. Entry/Exit Mismatch - Every entry into the station must be followed by an exit from the destination station. In case of mismatch, charges will be collected as per DMRC rules."\n"

3. Maximum period of stay - The maximum stay permissible in the Metro station is 170 minutes if entry/exit is from different stations.Within the same station, it is 20 minutes. In case of overstaying beyond permissible time(except tourist card) Penalty of Rs 10 per hour subject to maximum of Rs 50 will be charged."\n"
4. Keep the card safe - Please donot damage the Smart Card. No Refund is gauranteed on damaged cards."\n"

string-array.name: help_smartcard1
string-array.item: 1. Save Money - Get 10% discount on each journey performed using smart card."\n"
2. Save Time - No need to stand in queues for purchasing tokens"\n"
3. Gain Freedom - Terminate/extend your journey without preplanning."\n"
4. Enjoy Convenience - Board the train till the last minute"\n"
5. Be Flexible - Smart Card is Transferable"\n"
6. No Documentation - needed for smart card"\n"
7. Time taken - to issue smart card is same as token"\n"
8. Card is - easily transferable and can be used by anyone"\n"

string-array.name: help_smartcard2
string-array.item: 1. Travel Card - Min Value:150Rs. Max Value:1000Rs for frequent travellers"\n"
2. Tourist Card - Value Rs 150 for 1 day, Rs 300 for 3 days"\n"
3. Facility to check balance - At every station, ticket reading machines can help you check balance in card"\n"
4. Available at - customercare centre at all stations."\n"
